FileFormat.FormatDescription: Crystal Reports File is the proprietary format and main output file created by Crystal Reports, a business intelligence software. The software was created in 1991 and since then Crystal Reports has gone through multiple versions, though the file format structure has not changed dramatically.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: This format can be identified via a container signature in DROID version 6 or later. The PRONOM database cannot currently represent container signatures.
